name: Woody Block 3D
description:
Woody Block 3D , the mixture of the classic block puzzle and sudoku, is coming. It is the classic block puzzle game with new features and brings more fun.

Features of Woody Block 3D:
· 3D cube block
· Completely free to play
· Blocks CAN be rotated
· Pure game environment:NO time limit
· Innovation in the classics: Provide a grid to place a temporarily unwanted block
· Brand New combo mode: 3 times or more combo will cause a round of shaking
· Addictive game sound effects
· Great user interface: wooden style gets you close to nature.
· Constantly update the various shapes of blocks, classic and challenging
